TipsÂ¶

  • turn on cpptraj’s verbose
In [1]: import pytraj as pt

In [2]: traj = pt.iterload('data/tz2.nc', 'data/tz2.parm7')

In [3]: traj
Out[3]: 
<pytraj.TrajectoryIterator, 101 frames, include:
<Topology: 223 atoms, 13 residues, 1 mols, non-PBC>>
           

In [4]: pt.set_cpptraj_verbose(True)

In [5]: pt.radgyr(traj, '@C,N,O,H')
Out[5]: array([ 8.0704,  7.9877,  8.5166, ...,  6.4801,  6.3102,  6.6775])
